Isabella Rodriguez.description: hosting the potluck dinner at Hobbs Cafe (greeting the first guests as they arrive) @ the Ville:Hobbs Cafe:cafe:cafe customer seating

Maria Lopez.description: conversing about Maria Lopez and Klaus Mueller are planning to try out new vegan dishes at Hobbs Cafe next Monday at 6:00 pm, with plans to also explore vegan options at other cafes in town and have a vegan sushi date the following Friday. @ <persona> Klaus Mueller
chat: Maria Lopez
Hey Klaus! I remember we planned to try out those new vegan dishes at Hobbs Cafe next Monday at 6:00 pm. Are you still up for it?
Klaus Mueller
Hey Maria! Yes, I'm definitely still up for trying out those new vegan dishes at Hobbs Cafe next Monday at 6:00 pm. Looking forward to it!
Maria Lopez
Great! I'll see you there then. Do you have any specific vegan dishes in mind that you want to try?
Klaus Mueller
I've been really wanting to try the vegan lasagna and vegan chocolate cake, they sound delicious!
Maria Lopez
Those sound like great choices! I'm excited to try them out with you.
Klaus Mueller
I also heard they have a special on vegan sushi on Fridays, we should check that out next time!
Maria Lopez
That sounds like a plan! Let's make it a date for next Friday then?
Klaus Mueller
Sounds like a plan! I'll make sure to mark it on my calendar, looking forward to our vegan sushi date next Friday!
Maria Lopez
I'll text you the details later so we can coordinate our schedules.
Klaus Mueller
Thanks for organizing our food adventures, Maria! I appreciate it.
Maria Lopez
No problem, Klaus! I enjoy planning our food adventures.
Klaus Mueller
Looking forward to our vegan sushi date next Friday! I'll be ready to try out some of Isabella's special vegan creations.
Maria Lopez
I'm looking forward to trying Isabella's special vegan creations with you next Friday!
Klaus Mueller
I'm also curious to try the vegan tiramisu, I've heard it's amazing!
Maria Lopez
We should also plan to explore some vegan options at other cafes in town. There are a few places I've been wanting to try out.
Klaus Mueller
I'm excited to explore new vegan options with you at other cafes in town.
